item.title: Setting up GitHub Actions for Continuous Integration
item.description: I wanted to see how to automate the creation of docker images using github actions. This is how I did it. Create a repo Create a docker hub api key Create your application Create dockerfile Add github workflow Push and test! Let's go! Create a sample repo mkdir actionstest cd actionstest git init The roll over to GitHub and create a new repository.
